Author: michaelyup

Comment: You're absolutely correct.  China was humiliated by the West during the opium wars in the 19th century when they were weak. They've never forgotten that and they're not weak anymore.   Trump may never get the message and his idiotic followers across America may never get the message. But Republican Representatives and Senators depend on donations from corporations and other kinds of businesses. And businessmen will definitely get the message and put pressure on politicians who need their money.  I'm already seeing signs in both the House and the Senate that groups of Republicans are starting to realize what's happening and are becoming alarmed.  Money talks.
Author: Independent-Roof-774
